boost::logging::profile::logger_to_write

boost::logging::profile::logger_to_write<> Struct Template Reference

given the logger type, gets the write_msg part, without needing to know the logger's definition (a typedef is enough) More...

Detailed Description

template<class>
struct boost::logging::profile::logger_to_write<>

given the logger type, gets the write_msg part, without needing to know the logger's definition (a typedef is enough)
